statements: SELECT * FROM email_tracking;
SELECT email_id, email_link, utm_source FROM email_tracking WHERE utm_campaign='Summer Sale';
SELECT email_id, utm_source, utm_medium FROM email_tracking WHERE conversion_tracking=true;
SELECT email_id, email_link FROM email_tracking ORDER BY email_id DESC;
SELECT email_id, utm_source, utm_medium, utm_campaign FROM email_tracking WHERE conversion_tracking=false;
SELECT * FROM email_tracking WHERE utm_campaign = 'Summer Sale' ORDER BY email_id DESC;
SELECT email_id, email_link FROM email_tracking WHERE utm_source = 'Social Media' AND conversion_tracking = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM email_tracking WHERE utm_medium IN ('Email', 'Paid Search') ORDER BY email_id ASC;
SELECT email_id, email_link, utm_source FROM email_tracking WHERE utm_campaign LIKE '%Promo%' AND utm_medium = 'Email';
SELECT COUNT(email_id) AS total_emails, SUM(conversion_tracking::int) AS total_conversions FROM email_tracking WHERE conversion_tracking = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM email_links WHERE email_id = 1;
SELECT utm_source, utm_medium FROM email_links WHERE email_id = 3;
SELECT email_id, utm_campaign FROM email_links WHERE utm_source = 'Google';
SELECT * FROM conversions ORDER BY conversion_date DESC;
SELECT email_id, conversion_amount FROM conversions WHERE conversion_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-06-30';
SELECT email_id, utm_source, utm_medium, utm_campaign FROM email_links WHERE email_id = 1
SELECT * FROM conversions WHERE conversion_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY conversion_amount DESC
SELECT email_id, SUM(conversion_amount) AS total_amount FROM conversions GROUP BY email_id ORDER BY total_amount DESC
SELECT email_id, MAX(conversion_date) AS latest_conversion_date FROM conversions GROUP BY email_id
SELECT DISTINCT utm_source, utm_medium FROM email_links
SELECT * FROM email_links;
SELECT id, link, utm_source FROM email_links WHERE id = 1;
SELECT link_id, conversion_date, conversion_value FROM tracked_conversions ORDER BY conversion_date DESC;
SELECT id, link_id, click_date, ip_address FROM click_tracking WHERE ip_address = '192.168.1.1';
SELECT id, utm_medium, utm_campaign FROM email_links WHERE utm_medium = 'email' AND utm_campaign = 'summerSale';
SELECT * FROM email_links WHERE id = 1;
SELECT link, utm_source, utm_medium FROM email_links WHERE utm_campaign = 'summer_sale';
SELECT id, link, utm_source, utm_campaign FROM email_links ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM tracked_conversions JOIN email_links ON tracked_conversions.link_id = email_links.id WHERE conversion_value > 50;
SELECT link_id, click_date, ip_address FROM click_tracking WHERE click_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM campaign_links;
SELECT link_id, email_link FROM campaign_links WHERE utm_source='Facebook';
SELECT conversion_id, conversion_type FROM conversions ORDER BY conversion_timestamp DESC;
SELECT click_id, click_timestamp FROM click_tracking WHERE click_timestamp BETWEEN '2021-09-01' AND '2021-09-30';
SELECT attribute_key, attribute_value FROM conversion_attributes WHERE conversion_id=123;
SELECT * FROM campaign_links WHERE utm_medium = 'email';
SELECT link_id, email_link FROM campaign_links WHERE utm_source = 'Google' ORDER BY link_id DESC;

SELECT cl.link_id, ct.click_id, co.conversion_type FROM campaign_links cl JOIN click_tracking ct ON cl.link_id = ct.link_id JOIN conversions co ON ct.click_id = co.click_id WHERE co.conversion_type = 'purchase';
SELECT AVG(DATEDIFF(conversion_timestamp, click_timestamp)) AS avg_conversion_time FROM click_tracking ct JOIN conversions co ON ct.click_id = co.click_id;

SELECT cl.email_link, ca.attribute_key, ca.attribute_value FROM campaign_links cl JOIN conversions co ON cl.link_id = co.click_id JOIN conversion_attributes ca ON co.conversion_id = ca.conversion_id WHERE cl.utm_source = 'Facebook';
SELECT * FROM utm_campaigns WHERE utm_source = 'Google'
SELECT campaign_name, utm_source FROM utm_campaigns ORDER BY campaign_name DESC
SELECT email_address, first_name FROM email_contacts WHERE last_name IS NOT NULL
SELECT id, click_timestamp, utm_campaign FROM email_clicks WHERE utm_source = 'Facebook' ORDER BY click_timestamp ASC
SELECT conversion_id, attribution_method FROM conversion_attribution WHERE attribution_timestamp >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM utm_campaigns ORDER BY campaign_name DESC, utm_source ASC
SELECT email_address, first_name, last_name FROM email_contacts WHERE first_name IS NOT NULL AND last_name IS NOT NULL
SELECT campaign_name, utm_source, utm_medium FROM utm_campaigns WHERE utm_medium = 'social'
SELECT email_id, click_timestamp, utm_source, utm_campaign FROM email_clicks INNER JOIN utm_campaigns ON email_clicks.utm_campaign = utm_campaigns.campaign_name
SELECT conversion_id, attribution_method, attribution_timestamp FROM conversion_attribution ORDER BY attribution_timestamp DESC
